title: Did a Catholic School in California Remove Religious Statues from Its Campus?
subtitle: Conservative web sites accurately stated that the San Domenico school has removed some statues; but they exaggerated the extent of the removal and omitted crucial context.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2017, the San Domenico school in San Anselmo, California removed some Catholic statues from its campus in an effort to be more inclusive.
